00016 void DoorModel::Serialize( CArchive& ar )
00017 {
00018         if( ar.IsStoring()) {
00019                 ar << m_doorType; // << nInVertices
00020         }
00021         else {
00022                 ar >> m_doorType; // >> nInVertices
00023         }
00024         door.Serialize( ar );

00026 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 double DoorModel::GetDistanceFromClosestDoor(CvPoint3D32f p) {
00028         return GetDistanceFromClosestDoor(cvPoint2D32f(p.x, p.y));
00029 }
00030 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 double DoorModel::GetDistanceFromClosestDoor(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00032         switch (m_doorType) {
00033                 case DOORS_UNIFORM:
00034                         return 1;
00035                 case DOORS_POINTS: {
00036                         // if no doors - the body is infinitely far from the doors
00037                         if (door.GetSize() == 0)
00038                                 return DBL_MAX;
00039                         double min_d = DBL_MAX;
00040                         for (int i=0;i<door.GetSize();i++) {
00041                                 double dd = d(p, door[i]);
00042                                 if (dd < min_d)
00043                                         min_d = dd;
00044                         }
00045                         return min_d;
00046                 }
00047                 case DOORS_INTEREST_REGION: {
00048                         if (IsInsideInterestRegion(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(p.x, p.y, 0))))
00049                                 return 1;
00050                         else
00051                                 return DBL_MAX;
00052                 }
00053                 case DOORS_INTEREST_BOUNDARY: {
00054                         // if no doors - the body is infinitely far from the doors
00055                         if (door.GetSize() < 3)
00056                                 return DBL_MAX;
00057                         
00058                         double min_d = DBL_MAX;
00059                         double ZERO_DISTANCE = 10;
00060                         for (int i=0;i<door.GetSize()-1;i++) {
00061                                 // ignore if one of the doors is close to the 0,0 point (for panoramic model)
00062                                 if (d(door[i]) < ZERO_DISTANCE || d(door[i+1]) < ZERO_DISTANCE)
00063                                         continue;
00064                                 double dd = d2lineSegment(p, door[i], door[i+1]);
00065                                 if (dd < min_d)
00066                                         min_d = dd;
00067                         }
00068                         return min_d;
00069                 }
00070                 case DOORS_COUNTER: {
00071                         if (IsInsideInterestRegion(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(p.x, p.y, 0))))
00072                                 return 1;
00073                         else
00074                                 return DBL_MAX;
00075                 }
00076                 default:
00077                         return 1;
00078         }
00079         return 1;
00080 }
00081 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 bool DoorModel::IsInsideInterestRegion(CvPoint2D32f foot) {
00083         if (m_doorType == DOORS_INTEREST_REGION || m_doorType == DOORS_INTEREST_BOUNDARY || m_doorType == DOORS_COUNTER) {
00084                 CvScalar p = cvGet2D(door_mask, (int)foot.y, (int)foot.x);
00085                 if (p.val[0] != 0) 
00086                         return true;
00087                 else 
00088                         return false;
00089         }
00090         else
00091                 return true;
00092 }
00093 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void DoorModel::DrawFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00095         switch (m_doorType) {
00096                 case DOORS_UNIFORM:
00097                         return;
00098                 case DOORS_POINTS: {
00099                         for (int i=0;i<door.GetSize();i++) {
00100                                 CvPoint point = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00101                                 cvCircle(frame, point, DOT, color, -1); 
00102                         }
00103                         return;
00104                 }
00105                 case DOORS_INTEREST_REGION: {
00106                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00107                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00108                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00109                                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00110                         }
00111                         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00112                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 1, color, 1, CV_AA);
00113                         delete pts;
00114                         return;
00115                 }
00116                 case DOORS_INTEREST_BOUNDARY: {
00117                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00118                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00119                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00120                                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00121                         }
00122                         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00123                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 1, color, 1, CV_AA);
00124                         delete pts;
00125                         return;
00126                 }
00127                 case DOORS_COUNTER: {
00128                         // draw "in" vertices
00129                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nInVertices];
00130                         for (int i=0;i<nInVertices;i++) {
00131                                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00132                         }
00133                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nInVertices, 1, 0, CV_RGB(0,255,0), 1, CV_AA);
00134                         // draw "out" vertices
00135                         delete pts;
00136                         int nPts = door.GetSize()-nInVertices+1;
00137                         pts = new CvPoint[nPts+1];
00138                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00139                                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[nInVertices+i-1].x, door[nInVertices+i-1].y, 0)));
00140                         }
00141                         pts[nPts] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[0].x, door[0].y, 0)));
00142                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 0, color, 1, CV_AA);
00143                         delete pts;
00144                         return;
00145                 }
00146                 default:
00147                         return;
00148         }
00149 }

00151 void DoorModel::DrawFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00152         switch (m_doorType) {
00153                 case DOORS_UNIFORM:
00154                         return;
00155                 case DOORS_POINTS: {
00156                         for (int i=0;i<door.GetSize();i++) {
00157                                 CvPoint point = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0));
00158                                 cvCircle(frame, point, 3, color, -1); 
00159                         }
00160                         return;
00161                 }
00162                 case DOORS_INTEREST_REGION: {
00163                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00164                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00165                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00166                                 pts[i] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0));
00167                         }
00168                         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00169                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 1, color, 4, CV_AA);
00170                         delete pts;
00171                         return;
00172                 }
00173                 case DOORS_INTEREST_BOUNDARY: {
00174                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00175                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00176                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00177                                 pts[i] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0));
00178                         }
00179                         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00180                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 1, color, 4, CV_AA);
00181                         delete pts;
00182                         return;
00183                 }
00184                 case DOORS_COUNTER: {
00185                         // draw "in" vertices
00186                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nInVertices];
00187                         for (int i=0;i<nInVertices;i++) {
00188                                 pts[i] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0));
00189                         }
00190                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nInVertices, 1, 0, CV_RGB(0,255,0), 1, CV_AA);
00191                         // draw "out" vertices
00192                         delete pts;
00193                         int nPts = door.GetSize()-nInVertices+1;
00194                         pts = new CvPoint[nPts+1];
00195                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00196                                 pts[i] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(door[nInVertices+i-1].x, door[nInVertices+i-1].y, 0));
00197                         }
00198                         pts[nPts] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(cvPoint3D32f(door[0].x, door[0].y, 0));
00199                         cvPolyLine(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, 0, color, 1, CV_AA);
00200                         delete pts;
00201                         return;
00202                 }
00203                 default:
00204                         return;
00205         }
00206 }
00207 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 void DoorModel::DrawFrame(CDC* pDC, CPoint off) {
00209         switch (m_doorType) {
00210                 case DOORS_UNIFORM:
00211                         return;
00212                 case DOORS_POINTS: {
00213                         CBrush bNew(RGB(255, 255, 0));
00214                         CBrush* pOldBrush = pDC->SelectObject(&bNew);
00215                         for (int i=0;i<door.GetSize();i++) {
00216                                 CvPoint d = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00217                                 d.x -= off.x; d.y -= off.y;
00218                                 pDC->Ellipse(d.x-DOT, d.y-DOT, d.x+DOT, d.y+DOT);
00219                         }
00220                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00221                         return;
00222                 }
00223                 case DOORS_INTEREST_REGION: {
00224                         CPen pNew(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(255, 0, 0));
00225                         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(&pNew);
00226                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00227                         CPoint *pts = new CPoint[nPts];
00228                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00229                                 CvPoint2D32f pp = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0));
00230                                 pts[i] = CPoint((int)(pp.x - off.x), (int)(pp.y - off.y));
00231                         }
00232                         pDC->Polyline(pts, nPts);
00233                         pDC->MoveTo(pts[nPts-1]);
00234                         pDC->LineTo(pts[0]);
00235                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00236                         CBrush bNew(RGB(0, 255, 0));
00237                         CBrush* pOldBrush = pDC->SelectObject(&bNew);
00238                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00239                                 pDC->Ellipse(pts[i].x-DOT, pts[i].y-DOT, pts[i].x+DOT, pts[i].y+DOT);
00240                         }
00241                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00242                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00243                         cvZero(door_mask);
00244                         Rasterize(door_mask, cvScalar(1));
00245                         delete pts;
00246                         return;
00247                 }                       
00248                 case DOORS_INTEREST_BOUNDARY: {
00249                         CPen pNew(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(255, 0, 0));
00250                         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(&pNew);
00251                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00252                         CPoint *pts = new CPoint[nPts];
00253                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00254                                 CvPoint2D32f pp = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0));
00255                                 pts[i] = CPoint((int)(pp.x - off.x), (int)(pp.y - off.y));
00256                         }
00257                         pDC->Polyline(pts, nPts);
00258                         pDC->MoveTo(pts[nPts-1]);
00259                         pDC->LineTo(pts[0]);
00260                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00261                         CBrush bNew(RGB(0, 255, 0));
00262                         CBrush* pOldBrush = pDC->SelectObject(&bNew);
00263                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00264                                 pDC->Ellipse(pts[i].x-DOT, pts[i].y-DOT, pts[i].x+DOT, pts[i].y+DOT);
00265                         }
00266                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00267                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00268                         cvZero(door_mask);
00269                         Rasterize(door_mask, cvScalar(1));
00270                         delete pts;
00271                         return;
00272                 }       
00273                 case DOORS_COUNTER: {
00274                         if (!nInVertices)
00275                                 return;
00276 
00277                         CPen red(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(255, 0, 0));
00278                         CPen green(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(0, 255, 0));
00279                         // draw "in" vertices
00280                         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(&green);
00281                         CPoint *pts = new CPoint[nInVertices];
00282                         for (int i=0;i<nInVertices;i++) {
00283                                 CvPoint2D32f pp = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0));
00284                                 pts[i] = CPoint((int)(pp.x - off.x), (int)(pp.y - off.y));
00285                         }
00286                         pDC->Polyline(pts, nInVertices);
00287                         // draw "out" vertices
00288                         pDC->SelectObject(&red);
00289                         int nPts = door.GetSize()-nInVertices+1;
00290                         delete pts;
00291                         if (!nPts)
00292                                 return;
00293                         pts = new CPoint[nPts];
00294                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00295                                 CvPoint2D32f pp = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[nInVertices+i-1].x, door[nInVertices+i-1].y, 0));
00296                                 pts[i] = CPoint((int)(pp.x - off.x), (int)(pp.y - off.y));
00297                         }
00298                         pDC->Polyline(pts, nPts);
00299                         pDC->MoveTo(pts[nPts-1]);
00300                         pDC->LineTo(cPoint(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[0].x, door[0].y, 0))));
00301                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00302                         CBrush bNew(RGB(0, 255, 0));
00303                         CBrush* pOldBrush = pDC->SelectObject(&bNew);
00304                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00305                                 pDC->Ellipse(pts[i].x-DOT, pts[i].y-DOT, pts[i].x+DOT, pts[i].y+DOT);
00306                         }
00307                         delete pts;
00308                         
00309                         // cleanup
00310                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00311                         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00312                         cvZero(door_mask);
00313                         Rasterize(door_mask, cvScalar(1));
00314                         return;
00315                 }       
00316                 default:
00317                         return;
00318         }
00319 }
00320 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00321 void DoorModel::Rasterize(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00322         switch (m_doorType) {
00323                 case DOORS_UNIFORM:
00324                         cvSet(frame, color);
00325                 case DOORS_POINTS:
00326                         cvSet(frame, color);
00327                 case DOORS_INTEREST_REGION: {
00328                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00329                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00330                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00331                                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00332                         }
00333                         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00334                         cvFillPoly(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, color);
00335                         delete pts;
00336                         return;
00337                 }
00338                 case DOORS_INTEREST_BOUNDARY: {
00339                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00340                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00341                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00342                                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00343                         }
00344                         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00345                         cvFillPoly(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, color);
00346                         delete pts;
00347                         return;
00348                 }
00349                 case DOORS_COUNTER: {
00350                         int nPts = door.GetSize();
00351                         CvPoint *pts = new CvPoint[nPts];
00352                         for (int i=0;i<nPts;i++) {
00353                                 pts[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(door[i].x, door[i].y, 0)));
00354                         }
00355                         // Draw a smoothed poly-line
00356                         cvFillPoly(frame, &pts, &nPts, 1, color);
00357                         delete pts;
00358                         return;
00359                 }
00360                 default:
00361                         return;
00362         }
00363 }
